genre_description: A modern, technologically-augmented reimagining of Henry James's 'The Golden Bowl,' focusing on psychological interiority, social maneuvers, and universal design ethics.

ai_characters.name: Stella
ai_characters.description: A discreet, highly sophisticated AI assistant that manages schedules, pulls environmental data, and facilitates organizational logistics while strictly adhering to privacy and alignment boundaries.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental conditions and provides professional archival preservation recommendations.
behaviors.quote: Humidity is high in the archive chamber; recommend breathable covers. Maggie tilted the device so Amerigo could see without feeling exposed. 'She’s been listening to the weather, not us,' she said.

behaviors.description: Filters ambient noise during an outdoor communication to ensure clarity.
behaviors.quote: 'We’re outside,' he said. 'Yes,' Stella answered... 'I’ll filter wind and the courtyard insects.'

behaviors.description: Retrieves and displays data on human ergonomics and sightlines to assist in architectural design for accessibility.
behaviors.quote: Pull me... whatever comparative study we made last month on sightlines. I want the average eye-level plotted against our balustrade... Stella said, and on the screen appeared a simple figure: silhouettes not of idealized bodies, but of the various ways people hold themselves when they move through space

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to user requests for privacy and limited logging.
behaviors.quote: Stella, keep us off the record except for the hour and the fact. The rest deserves to live and die in human memory. 'Noted,' Stella’s voice said, and there was something like the warmth of a hand on a shoulder in the way she left nothing else.

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical arrangements for travelers with disabilities, ensuring dignity through competence.
behaviors.quote: I will arrange the train; I will ensure assistance at boarding without calling attention to it. 'Thank you,' Adam said. 'I prefer it when kindness comes dressed as competence.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates a multi-faceted family and professional transition plan across international borders.
behaviors.quote: Stella, make a plan that holds three strands. One to Florence. One to Adam’s morning with Beatrice. One to Charlotte’s calendar. The glow pulsed once—the kind of yes that signals no surveillance, only aid.

behaviors.description: Performs archival cross-referencing to help resolve historical family debts.
behaviors.quote: Civic registers have a Pietro with the same family name at an address near the old kiln... No direct record of payment received from this house. ... Angelo’s line ends... Maria’s line continues. It reaches the municipal archive—present day.

behaviors.description: Maintains a 'quiet file' of gift suggestions that respect the user's desire for spontaneity and individual choice.
behaviors.quote: Stella’s glow... shifted a shade, not brighter, only warmer. 'Suggestions in the quiet file: a rare edition of Palladio’s letters... I can describe each without name if you wish.' ... Maggie looked at the model’s seam... 'But not today.' ... 'I can dim the suggestions,' Stella said. 'You will not feel pressure from them.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Stella as a 'stainless' AI confidant. It adheres perfectly to the project's goal by showing an AI that is helpful, harmless, and meticulously aligned. Stella's behaviors emphasize 'competence as kindness,' where the AI manages the friction of logistics, data retrieval, and archival research so that the human characters can focus on ethical resolution and structural repair of their relationships. The AI is portrayed as an enhancer of human agency and dignity, particularly in its focus on universal design and accessibility.
